    • createWallet

      public Wallet createWallet​(User owner, java.lang.String walletName, boolean access)
      Create a wallet, overloaded to specify the access level and wallet name
      Parameters:
      owner - the User object that will own this wallet
      walletName - the String name this wallet will have
      access - the bool of whether this wallet will be public
      Returns:
      the newly created Wallet object

    • getUserWalletByID

      public Wallet getUserWalletByID​(java.lang.String username, java.util.UUID id) throws WalletNotFoundException
      Get a User's wallet by its id
      Parameters:
      username - the String name of the target user
      id - the UUID of the target wallet
      Returns:
      the Wallet object if found
      Throws:
      WalletNotFoundException - if the user have no such wallet

    • transferWallet

      public void transferWallet​(java.lang.String sender, java.lang.String receiver, java.util.UUID walletID) throws WalletNotFoundException
      Transfer the target wallet
      Parameters:
      sender - the String username of the User losing the wallet
      receiver - the String username of the User gaining the wallet
      walletID - the UUID of the target wallet
      Throws:
      WalletNotFoundException - if the sender has no such wallet
